content.rendered:
Directed by David Dhawan.

Written by Farhad Samji. Sajid.

Cast Varun Dhawan(Raja / Prem). Abhinay Raj Singh(Vinay choteey). Jacqueline Fernandez(Alishka). Taapsee Pannu(Samaara). Anupam Kher(Mr. Balraj Bakshi). Sachin Khedekar(Rajiv Malhotra). Pawan Malhotra(Inspector Kuldeep Dhillon (london Police)). Prachee Shah(Ankita Malhotra (as Prachi Shah)). Upasana Singh(Samaara’s Mom (as Upasna Singh)). Rajpal Naurang Yadav(Nandu (as Rajpal Yadav)). Vivan Bhatena(Alex). Zakir Hussain(Charles). Manoj Pahwa(Sarafat Ali). Manoj Joshi(Mamaji). Charlie Carter(The Priest). Fernanda Diniz(Anita). Johny Lever(Pappu Passport (as Johnny Lever)). Benny Bereal(Fox Mascott). Leyton Benta(Student). Ali Asgar(Doctor Lulla).Salman Khan. Adeel Ali(Adil). Ayesha Ali(Plane Passenger). Sarah Andrews(School Girl (as Sara Alves)). Manoj Anand(Plane Passenger). Deepshikha Arora(Plane Passenger). Hitanshu Arora(Basketball Fan). Raj Awasti(Plane Passenger / Restaurant Diner / Jogger). Juliana Barros(Restaurant Diner). Connor Brabyn(Jack (Rocky’s Gang Member)). Alejandro Bueno(Hotdog Guy). Jake Burnside(Hot Dog Guy 2). Tina Chandorkar(Student / Shop Keeper). Usman Chauhan(Plane Passenger). Sajia Chowdhury(Plane Passenger). Zachary Coffin(Police Captain). Gordon Cook(Plane passenger). Pamela Cook(Plane Passenger). Samer Singh Dawar(College Student (as Chirag Dawar)). Jake Deeble(Student). Jannat Dhillon(Shopper). Diana Evseeva(Shopper / Basketball Fan). Kristine Fernandez(Student). Nisha George(Plane Passenger). Shaj Goku(Dancer). Sonia Goswami(Plane Passenger). Dawit Gulilat(Basketball Fan). Naman Gupta(Student). Rameez Hassan(Jay- Music School Student). James Heron(Student laughing on balcony). Jasmin Hoinka(Basketball Fan). Pippa Hughes(Dancer). Charlie Siveyer(Basketball Thug). Dina Huntley(Basketball Fan). Ty Hurley(Plane Passenger). Levente Jakab(Plane Passenger). Peter Jay(Plane Passenger). Jackson Kai(Basketball Fan). Noor Lila(Student (as Shabnam Karimzada)). Bizhan Neromand(University Student). Biel TVZ(Snuck). Rosie Baglee(Dancer). Lauren Bracken(Pedestrian stunt woman dodge BMX). Tatiana Natalia Carpenter(Plane Passenger (as Tatiana Zarubova)). Rajiv Chabria(Dancer). Ken Hough(Basketball Spectator). Thiago Juliaci(Kabir). Sartaaj Kakkar(Young Raja). Robby Khela(Will). Dimple Kumar(Shopper). Nina Kumar(Plane Passenger / Restaurant Diner / Jogger). Chiara Lucotti(Nurse). Caio de Paula Massoni(Snuck (as Massoni)). Seema Morar(Plane Passenger). Selina Mughal(Dancer). Cher Myra(College student). Leah Nelthorpe(Plane Passenger). Rashid Osmanov(Plane Passenger). Jasmin Ottenburg(Dancer). Marc Outbreak(Professional Photographer). Harry Palmer(Henchman). Atul Parchure(Balraj Bakshi’s brother in law). Hiten Patel(Alex’s Henchman). Khushaal Pawar(Sim card). Aryan Prajapati(young Nandu). Donna Preston(Nancy). Hetal Puniwala(Doctor). Neha Pushp(Airline Stewardess – Tara). Fahad Qayyum(Sid). Rajat Rawail(Jewellery Shop Owner). Sean Rooney(Thug). Frank Saul(Basketball Team Coach). Mandeep Sehmi(Bald Airline Passenger). Atul Sharma(Shopper). Divya Sharma(Basketball Fan). Vineet Sharma(Custom Officer). Vinita Sharma(Shopper). Harsh Shashwat(Digital promoter). Joanna Shegera(Plane Passenger). Mandeep Singh(Varun dhawan friend). Skaterrboyy20(Ravi). Anna Tilbury(Front Row Basketball Fan). Madhav Trivedi(Rajja). Vikas Verma(Rocky). Umesh Wadhvani(Plane Passenger). Anna Weston(Plane Passenger). Kieran Wynne(Dancer). Kirin Ali(Student (uncredited)). Nilanjana Bhattacharya(Student (uncredited)). Adrian Bronin(College Dancer (uncredited)). Jay Gandhi(Student (uncredited)). Marta Glowacka-Escote(Cheerleader (uncredited)). Metin Hassan(Basketball Coach (uncredited)). Adam Lezemore(Student (uncredited)). Alpesh Malaviya(Basketball Fan (uncredited)). Kevin Matadeen(Student (uncredited)). Laura Matassa(Plane Passenger (uncredited)). Zivile Matikiene(Basketball Fan (uncredited)). Nathan Mullings(Student (uncredited)). Jip Panosot(Student (uncredited)). Priyal Patel(Student (uncredited)). Louis Paterson(Aeroplane Passenger (uncredited)). Nathalie Pierrat(Student (uncredited)). Amore Psiche(Student (uncredited)). Priscilla Riot(Student (uncredited)). Tara Sumner(Gang member (uncredited)). Wei-Chen Sun(Student (uncredited)). Tony Sweeney(Airport Pedestrian (uncredited)). Gauri Vedhara(Basketball Fan (uncredited)). Donna Whelan(Basketball Fan (uncredited)). Stuart Whelan(Sports crowd / shop customer (uncredited)). John Wonnacott(Airplane Passenger (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Himanshu Joshi. Firuzi Khan. Nasir Khan. Rakesh Madhotra. Kapil Madnani. Chris Martin. Manoj Mittra. Ronak Motla. Sajid Nadiadwala. Sudipto Sarkar. Sushanto Sarkar. Dhiraj Shah. Yogiraj Shetty.

Production Apple & Orange Pictures. Fox STAR Studios. Nadiadwala Grandson Entertainment.
